mysteryDungeon:AspearBerryPotion.NAME: Aspear Berry
DESCRIPTIONS: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Draw #b%s cards.

mysteryDungeon:AuxPowerGuardPotion.NAME: Aux Power Guard
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%s #yFocus.

mysteryDungeon:BerryJuicePotion.NAME: Berry Juice
DESCRIPTIONS: Scry #b%s. Next turn draw #b2 more cards.
Scry #b%s. Next turn draw #b4 more cards.

mysteryDungeon:DireHitPotion.NAME: Dire Hit
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next attack deals double damage.

mysteryDungeon:ElixirPotion.NAME: Elixir
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E] [E] . Add #b2 #yBurn to your hand.
Gain [E] [E] [E] [E] [E] [E] . Add #b4 #yBurn to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:FlameOrbPotion.NAME: Flame Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply #b%s #yBurn to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:GoldenRazzBerryPotion.NAME: Golden Razz Berry Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%s #yBuffer.

mysteryDungeon:AuxPowerPotion.NAME: Aux Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next attack deals #b%s more damage.

mysteryDungeon:HopoBerryPotion.NAME: Hopo Berry
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose between one random Attack or Skill card. Add it to your hand. It cost 0 this turn.
Choose between one random Attack or Skill card. Add it to your hand. It cost 0 this turn.

mysteryDungeon:LeppaBerryPotion.NAME: Leppa Berry
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose #b%s cards to retain at the end of your turn.

mysteryDungeon:LiechiBerryPotion.NAME: Liechi Berry
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b%s cards.
Draw #b%s cards.

mysteryDungeon:MagoBerryPotion.NAME: Mago Berry
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal #b%1$s HP. Gain #b%2$s #yPoison.

mysteryDungeon:MeowthCandyPotion.NAME: Meowth Candy
DESCRIPTIONS: Spend #b20 gold. Do the effects of #b2 random #yPotions.

mysteryDungeon:NuggetPotion.NAME: Nugget
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%s gold.

mysteryDungeon:PikachuCandyPotion.NAME: Pikachu Candy
DESCRIPTIONS: Enter #yPositive or #yNegative #yStance.

mysteryDungeon:PinapBerryPotion.NAME: Pinap Berry
DESCRIPTIONS: Channel #b%s Frost orbs.
Channel #b%s Frost orbs.

mysteryDungeon:PoisonBarbPotion.NAME: PoisonBarb
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply #b%s #yPoison to an enemy.

mysteryDungeon:RawstBerryPotion.NAME: Rawst Berry
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply #b%s #yBurn. Burn stacks don't decrease for #b1 turn on the target.
Apply #b%s #yBurn. Burn stacks don't decrease for #b2 turns on the target.

mysteryDungeon:SitrusBerryPotion.NAME: Sitrus Berry
DESCRIPTIONS: Put #b%s card from your exhaust pile in your hand.
Put #b%s cards from your exhaust pile in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:StarfBerryPotion.NAME: Starf Berry
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%s #yVigor.

mysteryDungeon:XAttackPotion.NAME: X Attack
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b%s #yFlinch to your hand. They cost #b0 this turn.

mysteryDungeon:XSpAttackPotion.NAME: X Sp. Attack
DESCRIPTIONS: Fill all your Orb slots with #yLightning.
